jd: From: Pradeep, Scalable Systems pradeep.sharma@scalable-systems.com Reply to: pradeep.sharma@scalable-systems.com Hi,Greetings of the day! I have an urgent requirement below, please go through JD and let me know if you are comfortable or have any profile. Kindly revert me back with your updated resume as well. Job Title: Data Engineering Lead Consumer IAM Location: Zumbrota, MN (Work from Office)Duration: Long Term Contract Responsibilities:7+ years of experience in data engineering, with at least 3 years in a lead or senior role.Strong experience working in Identity and Access Management (IAM) or security domains.Expertise in building and managing large-scale data processing frameworks (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, Kafka) for IAM systems.Hands-on experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and their data services (e.g., S3, Redshift, BigQuery).In-depth knowledge of relational databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL), NoSQL databases (e.g., DynamoDB, MongoDB), and data warehousing.Experience with CI/CD pipelines, version control (Git), and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).Understanding of encryption, tokenization, and other data protection mechanisms in the context of IAM.Familiarity with IAM standards and protocols (e.g., OAuth, OpenID Connect, SAML, LDAP). Thanks & Regards, Pradeep SharmaEmail: pradeep.sharma@scalable-systems.com "Scalable Systems is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, or any other legally protected status."
